name: The Jolly Journey of J.J.'s Jelly-Jamventure
name_original: The Jolly Journey of J.J.'s Jelly-Jamventure
description:
“The Jolly Journey of J.J.’s Jelly-Jamventure” is the latest installment from the Quibbles Gameplay Universe by the developers at Poqagames!

You play as “J.J.”, and your goal is to eat ALL the jellies you can find! If you eat enough jellies, you’ll break through the loop and go to the next stage!

Be careful, the villagers are out there in the world… Some of them help you, but some of them can hurt you… Be Brave, and see if you can get to the end!

Controls:

  • [LEFT CLICK] to Jump!
  • [HOLD LEFT CLICK] to Jump Higher!
  • [DOUBLE JUMP] by pressing Jump while in the air!

Learn about each enemy in the Story Window!
